org.pac4j.play.java
Class JavaWebContext

java.lang.Object
  org.pac4j.core.context.BaseResponseContext
      org.pac4j.play.java.JavaWebContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.pac4j.core.context.WebContext
public class JavaWebContext
extends org.pac4j.core.context.BaseResponseContext

This class is the Java web context for Play. "Session objects" are stored into cache.

Since:
1.1.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu
